argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsummptfssub.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsummptfssub.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsummptfssub.s | |- .- = ( -g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | gsummptfssub.g | |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) |
| 5 |  | gsummptfssub.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 6 |  | gsummptfssub.c | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. B ) |
| 7 |  | gsummptfssub.d | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> D e. B ) |
| 8 |  | gsummptfssub.f | |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. A |-> C ) ) |
| 9 |  | gsummptfssub.h | |- ( ph -> H = ( x e. A |-> D ) ) |
| 10 |  | gsummptfssub.w | |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) |
| 11 |  | gsummptfssub.v | |- ( ph -> H finSupp .0. ) |
| 12 | 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 | #P_offval2 | |- ( ph -> ( F oF .- H ) = ( x e. A |-> ( C .- D ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( C .- D ) ) = ( F oF .- H ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( x e. A |-> ( C .- D ) ) ) = ( G gsum ( F oF .- H ) ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. A |-> C ) = ( x e. A |-> C ) |
| 16 | 6, 15 | #P_fmptd | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) : A --> B ) |
| 17 | 8 | #P_feq1d | |- ( ph -> ( F : A --> B <-> ( x e. A |-> C ) : A --> B ) ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. A |-> D ) = ( x e. A |-> D ) |
| 20 | 7, 19 | #P_fmptd | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> D ) : A --> B ) |
| 21 | 9 | #P_feq1d | |- ( ph -> ( H : A --> B <-> ( x e. A |-> D ) : A --> B ) ) |
| 22 | 20, 21 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> H : A --> B ) |
| 23 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 18, 22, 10, 11 | #P_gsumsub | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( F oF .- H ) ) = ( ( G gsum F ) .- ( G gsum H ) ) ) |
| 24 | 14, 23 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( x e. A |-> ( C .- D ) ) ) = ( ( G gsum F ) .- ( G gsum H ) ) ) |
